attributes.action: Make persons taking money from workers pension fund face criminal charges.
attributes.background: There are numerous examples where company directors have stolen the workers pension fund leaving these hard working people to face poverty in their old age, while paying themselves hefty salaries and looking after their own retirement pot. This needs to change and making it a crime will help.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
